      java.awt.Color[] getHighlightColors(java.lang.String stageId)
      Since multiple reports (possibly from different channels) are possible per stage: 1) All reports must have the highlighted text occur in the same order, which is the order this method returns them in, and 2) Not all highlights have to occur in every report.
      java.lang.String[] getHighlights(java.lang.String stageId)
      Since multiple reports (possibly from different channels) are possible per stage: 1) All reports must have the highlighted text occur in the same order, which is the order this method returns them in, and 2) Not all highlights have to occur in every report.

      • getHighlightColors

        public java.awt.Color[] getHighlightColors(java.lang.String stageId)
        Description copied from interface: CampaignEventPlugin
        Since multiple reports (possibly from different channels) are possible per stage: 1) All reports must have the highlighted text occur in the same order, which is the order this method returns them in, and 2) Not all highlights have to occur in every report.
        Specified by:
        getHighlightColors in interface CampaignEventPlugin
        Overrides:
